entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 11:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -13.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
